dc:title: Have You Ever Been To Jail?
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An invitation to reflect on the value of going to jail as a conscientious objector, for freedom's sake. Comments on two books about jail and her prison experiences. Relates the indignity of being in jail to the folly of the cross.
